item.description: Happy Holidays Everyone! The intention for our next meetup is to check in where we all are in relation to Integral. And to just hang out and get to know each other a little better. I realize many of our meetups have been formal with our speaker series, but I also believe we should also take some time to build community. And here's our chance to do it. Please bring a light appetizer, snack, or dessert with you to share. We will start the new year with a party and a dialogue over a couple topics. I hope you can make it, and I am looking forward to seeing everyone!
item.name: The Boston Integral Social
